Verses: 1 appozhudhu Themaaniyanaagiya Elippaas Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
2 naangal Ummudane Pesaththunindhaal, Aayaasappaduveero? Aanaalum Pesaamal Adakkikkollaththakkavan Yaar?
3 idho, Neer Anegarukku Buththisolli, Ilaiththa Kaigalaith Thidappaduththineer.
4 vizhugiravanai Ummudaiya Vaarththaigalaal Nirkappanni, Thallaadugira Muzhangaalgalai Balappaduththineer.
5 ippozhudho Thunbam Umakku Nerittapadiyinaal Aayaasappadugireer; Adhu Ummaith Thottadhinaal Kalangugireer.
6 ummudaiya Dhevabakthi Ummudaiya Urudhiyaayum, Ummudaiya Vazhigalin Uththamam Ummudaiya Nambikkaiyaayum Irukkavendiyadhallavo?
7 kutramillaamal Azhindhavan Undo? Sanmaarkkar Adhampannappattadhu Eppo? Idhai Ninaiththuppaarum.
8 naan Kandirukkirapadi, Aniyaayaththai Uzhudhu, Theevinaiyai Vidhaiththavargal, Adhaiye Arukkiraargal.
9 dhevanudaiya Suvaasaththinaale Avargal Azhindhu, Avarudaiya Naasiyin Kaatrinaale Nirmoolamaagiraargal.
10 singaththin Kerchchippum, Dhushta Singaththin Muzhakkamum Adangum; Paalasingangalin Parkalum Thagarndhupom.
11 kizhachchingam Raiyillaamaiyaal Maandupom, Paalasingangal Sidharundupom.
12 ippodhum Oruvaarththai Ennidaththil Ragasiyamaai Arivikkappattadhu, Adhinudaiya Melliya Osai En Seviyil Vizhundhadhu.
13 manusharmel Ayarndha Niththirai Irangugaiyil, Raaththarisanangalil Palavidha Thotrangal Undaagumpodhu,
14 thigilum Nadukkamum Ennaippidiththadhu, En Elumbugalellaam Nadunginadhu.
15 appozhudhu Oru Aavi En Mugaththukku Munbaagak Kadandhadhu, En Udalin Mayir Silirththadhu.
16 adhu Oru Uruppola En Kangalukkumun Nindradhu, Aanaalum Adhin Roobam Innadhendru Vilangavillai; Amaidhalundaayitru, Appozhudhu Naan Ketta Saththamaavadhu:
17 manushan Dhevanaippaarkkilum Needhimaanaayiruppaano? Manupuththiran Thannai Undaakkinavaraippaarkkilum Suththamaayiruppaano?
18 kelum, Avar Thammudaiya Panividaikkaararidaththil Nambikkai Vaippadhillai; Thammudaiya Thoodharinmelum Buththiyeenaththai Sumaththugiraare.
19 puzhudhiyil Asthibaaram Pottu, Man Veedugalil Vaasampanni, Pottuppoochchiyaal Arikkappadugiravargalmel Avar Nambikkai Vaippadhu Eppadi?
20 kaalaimudhal Maalaivaraikkum Madindhu, Gavanippaar Oruvarumillaamal, Niththiya Azhivadaigiraargal.
21 avargalilirukkira Avargaludaiya Menmai Poividumallavo? Gnaanamadaiyaamal Saagiraargal Endru Sonnaan.
